The climate of Bavaria in april is tolerable

In april in Bavaria, the climate is wet (with 70mm of precipitation over 5 days). The weather is better from the previous month since in march it receives an average of 93mm of rainfall over 6 days.

The climate is quite cold in that locality this month, but it is tolerable by dressing hot. Temperatures are up to 15°C. On average, the recorded minimum temperature is 7°C. Thus, the mean temperature average in april in Bavaria is 11°C. These temperatures are far removed from those records observed in Bavaria in the month of april with a maximum record of 26°C in 2012 and a minimum record of -6°C in 2013. You can plan to have about 10 days with temperatures up to 18°C, or 33% of the month.

On this month of april, day length in Bavaria is generally 13:43. The sun rises at 05:23 and sets at 19:06.

With proper weather, april is okay (but not good) to go in that area.

Bavaria: another month?

If you can push back the dates of your trip, we advise you to go in may to Bavaria. more information

Weather data for Bavaria in april:

Weather data for Bavaria for april are derived from an average of the weather forecast since 2009 in Bavaria. There is a margin of error and these forecasts are to be considered as general information only. The weather in Bavaria can vary slightly from year to year, but this data should limit surprises.
